channel.title: Client Running Error Please Help!
channel.description:
Hey guys I tried to run my client and this is what i got
Read Error: c:/espkc_32/Anim/1899.dat c:\espkc_32\cacheVers2.dat Error connecting to server. java.io.FileNotFoundException: c:\espkc_32\cache.zip?m (The filename, directory name, or volume label syntax is incorrect) at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:212) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:104) at client.downloadcache(client.java:3661) at client.method67(client.java:3757) at client.method6(client.java:7374) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:52) at client.run(client.java:4908) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722) Any1 Know What I Have To Do??
